author: Ted
content:
Ahhhhh sooo... In a way you rarely do the commonplace. And in other way it is all you do. But given your super powers of PP and camera control (which I guess are pre P) in a way you don't do spontaneity even though you have the power to make your own control invisible.

Which I guess is why I find the first in this series up at the top one of your most interesting ever. In a sense it is about nothing. But it's really about our setting ... the stage scenery. No... no.. it's better than that... it's a peek behind the Austrian scenery. A series like this would tell us a whole bunch about what supports life. It's the infrastructure.. and look at its astonishing solidity! Just one tiny piece of the capital inheritance which holds up all the rest.

Yep... it's an image that couldn't be made in such a large part of the entire world... Yet it's one that you take for granted. I'd REEEEEELY like to see more of these. More... more.. more...
